unit_abilities.FACTION: Nurgle’s Gift (Aura)Putrescent Vitality (Psychic): At the start of the Fight phase, you can select one enemy unit within 18" of and visible to this Psyker and roll one D6: on a 1, this Psyker’s unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 2+, until the end of the phase, each time an attack is allocated to a model in this Psyker’s unit, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.
